FRONT_END.TITLE: Front end
FRONT_END.DESCRIPTION: Creation of dynamic, accessible, and responsive user interfaces, focusing on performance, efficient maintenance, and an intuitive user experience.

BACK_END.TITLE: Back end
BACK_END.DESCRIPTION: Development of robust, scalable, and secure systems, ensuring efficiency, modularity, and seamless integration between services and data.

MOBILE.TITLE: Mobile
MOBILE.DESCRIPTION: Development of modern and high-performance mobile applications using leading technologies that enable the creation of native and responsive experiences for hybrid projects, ensuring flexibility and quality in cross-platform solutions.

TEST.TITLE: Testing
TEST.DESCRIPTION: Experience in creating and implementing automated tests to ensure code quality and reliability. Knowledge of tools and libraries for unit, integration, and end-to-end testing, promoting stability and confidence in the development cycle.

DATABASE.TITLE: Database
DATABASE.DESCRIPTION: Advanced knowledge in designing, managing, and optimizing relational and non-relational databases, ensuring performance, security, and scalability in data storage and retrieval.

DEVOPS.TITLE: DevOps
DEVOPS.DESCRIPTION: Implementation of practices and tools that connect development and operations, promoting automation, continuous integration, fast delivery, and efficient monitoring to ensure reliable and high-performance systems.

LIBS.TITLE: Key Libraries
LIBS.DESCRIPTION: Expertise in widely used libraries in the market, essential for optimizing workflows, handling data, managing state, and integrating advanced features into modern projects.
